data.client_settings: Not server DMs, everyone can add me, voice activity, overlay on, desktop and notifications sound disabled, TTS off and automated emote-to-emoji off.
data.actual_result: You'll have 11 people, once you kick one will remain 10 and you can't add anyone else.
data.expected_result: You'll have 11 members or more if done with way more people.
data.short_description: 11 people (or more) on a group DM chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1 Have nine members on a group chat.  - Step 2 Have perfect timing with a friend. - Step 3 Invite someone to the group chat at the same time.
